content.en: Aerodynamic shape optimization: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to optimize the design of aerodynamic shapes. These algorithms, such as automatic differentiation and gradient-based Newton-Krylov algorithms, utilize advanced techniques to improve the efficiency and complexity of aerodynamic design. By using surrogate models and multi-fidelity analyses, researchers are able to achieve faster and more efficient optimization processes for aerodynamic shape design.
content.da: Aerodynamisk formoptimering: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer til at optimere designet af aerodynamiske former. Disse algoritmer, såsom automatisk differentiering og gradient-baserede Newton-Krylov-algoritmer, anvender avancerede teknikker til at forbedre effektiviteten og kompleksiteten af aerodynamisk design. Ved at bruge surrogate-modeller og multi-fidelity-analyser er forskere i stand til at opnå hurtigere og mere effektive optimeringsprocesser for aerodynamisk formdesign.
